marketNews.title: üìâ Ex Dividend & PUPS, ADRO Drops to ARB
marketNews.content: Alam Tri Resources Indonesia ($ADRO) - formerly known as Adaro Energy Indonesia - stock price dropped -24.8% and hit the lower auto reject limit (ARB) at 2,760 rupiah per share today, Thursday (28/11). This decline occurred along with the ex-date for dividends of up to 2.6 billion US dollars to be distributed by ADRO on December 6, 2024. ADRO will only announce the dividend per share value tomorrow, Friday (29/11). Assuming the dividend distribution uses its maximum value and an exchange rate of rupiah to US dollar at 15,811, this dividend is equivalent to ~1,352 rupiah per share. In addition to the dividend ex-date, today is also the ex-date for the public offering rights (PUPS) for Adaro Andalan Indonesia ($AADI), ADRO's subsidiary in the thermal coal business which will be spun-off shortly. The AADI PUPS offering price ranges from 2.4-2.6 billion US dollars, depending on the Volume Weighed Average Price (VWAP) on the first day the issuer lists on the stock exchange. Assuming an exchange rate of 15,811 rupiah per US dollar, this price range is equivalent to ~5,550-5,950 rupiah per share. Investors who have received AADI PUPS rights and wish to exercise them can exercise between December 6-10, 2024. AADI itself will list on the IDX on December 5, 2024, with the initial public offering period scheduled for November 29-December 3, 2024. The initial offering price for AADI shares was set at 5,550 rupiah per share. Key Takeaway: Today's drop in ADRO's stock price is in line with our previous forecast that ADRO would experience a significant decline on the dividend and PUPS ex-date*. Previously, we discussed scenario analysis regarding the spin-off of AADI from ADRO through a [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XfltHbNUewY&pp=ygUNc3RvY2tiaXQgYWRybw%3D%3D) video and [Stockbit Commentary](https://stockbit.com/post/16333888) on Stockbit Stream. In the analysis we made, we estimated that ADRO's stock price in the base case scenario could drop to 1,900 per share, implying a valuation of 6.6x P/E (annualized 1H24). The decline in ADRO's stock price may be compensated - partially, entirely, or exceeded - by the potential rise in AADI's stock price according to the ownership ratio. Moving forward, ADRO investors can pay attention to the dividend per share amount to be announced on Friday (29/11). For ADRO investors who wish to exercise AADI PUPS using Stockbit, we advise exercising by December 9, 2024, at 10:00 WIB at the latest.

marketNews.title: üèóÔ∏è UNTR 10M24: Komatsu Sales Reach 86.5% of 2024 Target
marketNews.content: $UNTR: United Tractors recorded Komatsu brand heavy equipment sales of 443 units (+19.4% MoM, +35.5% YoY) in October 2024. Cumulatively over 10M24, Komatsu sales reached 3,764 units (-19.8% YoY), equivalent to 86.5% of the 2024 target of 4,350 units, with a market share of 27% (vs. 9M24: 27%, 10M23: 30%). From the mining contractor segment, UNTR recorded coal production volume of 125 million tons (+14.7% YoY) during 10M24, with overburden removal of 1 billion bcm (+6.8% YoY). $POWR: Cikarang Listrindo will distribute interim dividends for the 2024 book year amounting to ~28.1 million US dollars or 28.2 rupiah per share. The cum date in the regular and negotiation markets is December 6, 2024, with payment on December 18, 2024. Referring to the POWR stock price at the close of the market on Thursday (28/11) at 705 rupiah per share, the indicative dividend yield is 4%. $GEMS: Golden Energy Mines will distribute interim dividends for the 2024 book year amounting to ~90 million US dollars or 0.0153 US dollars per share, equivalent to 242.7 rupiah per share assuming an exchange rate of rupiah to US dollar at 15,864. The cum date in the regular and negotiation markets is December 6, 2024, with payment on December 17, 2024. Referring to the GEMS stock price at the close of the market on Thursday (28/11) at 11,300 rupiah per share, the indicative dividend yield is 1.5%. Previously, GEMS distributed interim dividends for the 2024 book year in September 2024 and June 2024 amounting to 0.0255 US dollars per share respectively. $UNVR: Unilever Indonesia will distribute interim dividends for the 2024 book year amounting to ~1.6 trillion rupiah or 41 rupiah per share. The cum date in the regular and negotiation markets is December 4, 2024, with payment on December 19, 2024. Referring to the UNVR stock price at the close of the market on Thursday (28/11) at 1,885 rupiah per share, the indicative dividend yield is 2.2%. $CITA: Cita Mineral Investindo announced that it has taken part in 176,556 (12.5%) new shares issued by Adaro Minerals Indonesia's ($ADMR) subsidiary entity, PT Kalimantan Aluminium Industry, worth 176.6 billion rupiah. Besides CITA, other shareholders of PT Kalimantan Aluminium Industry also participated according to their respective ownership portions. After this transaction, the ownership portion of shareholders in PT Kalimantan Aluminium Industry remains unchanged, with PT Adaro Indo Aluminium holding 65%, Aumay Mining Pte. Ltd. holding 22.5%, and CITA holding 12.5%. $AMMN: Amman Mineral Internasional President Director, Alexander Ramlie, bought ~1.4 million AMMN shares at an average price of 9,638 rupiah per share on November 21-22, 2024. The total transaction value reached ~13.6 billion rupiah. After this transaction, Alexander Ramlie's ownership in AMMN increased from 0.534% to 0.536%. $BIRD: Bluebird Group Holding President Commissioner, Noni Purnomo, told Bloomberg that the presence of BYD's plant in Indonesia could lower electric vehicle prices. Noni mentioned that the price of an electric vehicle for Blue Bird is about 3.5x higher than the price of a conventional car. A decrease in the price of electric vehicles could help BIRD in transforming its fleet, where the company targets electric vehicle contribution to reach 3% of the total fleet by 2025 and 20% of the total fleet by 2030. As of the end of 2023, BIRD's total fleet reached 23,000 vehicles, 1% of which was contributed by electric vehicles. The BYD plant in Indonesia is scheduled to start operating in early 2026. $SGER: Sumber Global Energy obtained a coal sales contract with a Philippine company, Minergy Power Corporation. This transaction has a potential contract value of 10.94 million US dollars. $WSKT: Antara reported that Waskita Karya targets new contract acquisition of 14.5 trillion rupiah during 2024, which is -14.2% lower than the realization in 2023 of 16.9 trillion rupiah. WSKT itself has recorded new contract acquisition of 6.8 trillion rupiah (-48.1% YoY) during 10M24, equivalent to 46.9% of the 2024 target. Waskita Karya Director, Rudi Purnomo, stated that they will announce an additional new contract of 5.8 trillion rupiah until the end of 2024. Furthermore, Rudi mentioned that WSKT is currently participating in an elevated toll road tender from private parties worth 3 trillion rupiah, and is exploring several building construction projects.

marketNews.title: Policy and Macroeconomic Updates
marketNews.content: National Economic Council Chairman, Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan, said that the increase in the value-added tax (PPN) rate to 12% effective January 1, 2025, is "almost certainly postponed," although the decision will still depend on the results of the government meeting. Luhut mentioned that the government plans to first provide stimulus to the middle class through social assistance (bansos), intended as a buffer to cushion the impact of the PPN increase. The plan is for the social assistance to be provided not in the form of direct cash assistance (BLT), but rather electricity energy subsidies. The Personal Consumption Expenditures (PCE) index in the US was recorded to have increased to 2.3% YoY in October 2024 (vs. September 2024: 2.1% YoY), in line with consensus expectations. On a monthly basis, PCE inflation reached 0.2% MoM (vs. September 2024: 0.2% MoM inflation), in line with consensus expectations. Meanwhile, the core PCE index - which is the Fed's long-term inflation indicator - stabilized at 0.3% MoM (vs. September 2024: 0.3% MoM inflation), in line with expectations. Annually, core PCE inflation reached 2.8% YoY (vs. September 2024: 2.7% YoY inflation), in line with expectations and marking the highest level in the last 6 months. Bloomberg reported that BYD has asked its suppliers to accept price cuts next year, signaling that the Chinese electric vehicle manufacturer is preparing for a price war. The Bloomberg report was based on a screenshot circulating on the social media Weibo, where BYD requested a 10% price cut starting January 2025 from an unnamed supplier. BYD Director, Li Yunfei, stated that bargaining with suppliers is a common practice in the automotive industry and that they can negotiate supply prices. MIND ID Director of Portfolio and Business Development, Dilo Seno Widagdo, said that they are currently designing an equity story for PT Indonesia Asahan Aluminium (Inalum) to make it more attractive when offered to investors in the stock market. Although Dilo did not specify when Inalum will IPO, he emphasized that funding needs are one of the considerations for MIND ID to bring its subsidiaries to the stock exchange. MIND ID itself estimates that capex in 2025-2029 will reach 267.8 trillion rupiah. This capex covers its 4 subsidiaries, namely Aneka Tambang ($ANTM), Bukit Asam ($PTBA), Timah ($TINS), and Inalum. DealStreetAsia reported that Bakmi GM operator, PT Griya MieSejati, is considering a strategic share sale valued at 2.1 trillion rupiah.

marketNews.title: SILO Shareholders Approve Yasonna H Laoly as President Commissioner
marketNews.content: Siloam International Hospitals ($SILO) shareholders approved the appointment of former Minister of Law and Human Rights for the 2014-2024 period, Yasonna H Laoly, as the company's president commissioner. Besides Yasonna, SILO shareholders also approved the new board of commissioners composition, which is filled by Toby Hall, Sigit Prasetya, Kartini Sjahrir, and Andy Purwohardono. In the board of directors, SILO shareholders approved the appointment of David Utama as president director, as well as the appointment of Gabriele Isacco Tironi, Surya Tatang, and Richard Kidarsa as the company's new directors.

marketNews.title: Indika Energy Forms New Subsidiary for Logistics Expansion
marketNews.content: Indika Energy ($INDY) through 2 of its subsidiaries, PT Indika Logistic & Support Services and PT Interport Mandiri Utama, formed a new subsidiary named PT Interport Sarana Infrastruktur Indonesia. The establishment of this subsidiary is intended for business expansion in the logistics sector.

marketNews.title: TAMU Secures Barge Charter Contract from Pertamina Hulu Energi
marketNews.content: Pelayaran Tamarin Samudra ($TAMU) obtained a barge charter contract worth 194.7 billion rupiah from PT Pertamina Hulu Energi OSES. This contract will run until May 31, 2029.

tickerNews.title: ADRO Stock Price Drops Significantly on Ex-Date for Dividend and AADI PUPS
tickerNews.content: Harga saham Alamtri Resources Indonesia ($ADRO) - dulu dikenal sebagai Adaro Energy Indonesia - turun -24,8% dan menyentuh batas _auto reject_ bawah (ARB) di level 2.760 rupiah per saham pada hari ini, Kamis (28/11). Penurunan ini terjadi seiring _ex date_ dividen hingga 2,6 miliar dolar AS yang akan dibagikan oleh ADRO pada 6 Desember 2024. ADRO baru akan mengumumkan nilai dividen per saham pada besok, Jumat (29/11). Dengan asumsi pembagian dividen menggunakan nilai maksimumnya dan kurs rupiah terhadap dolar AS di level 15.811, maka dividen tersebut setara ~1.352 rupiah per saham.

tickerNews.title: AADI Ex-Date for Public Offering Rights Coincides with ADRO's Drop
tickerNews.content: Selain _ex date_ dividen, hari ini juga merupakan _ex date_ hak penawaran umum oleh pemegang saham (PUPS) untuk Adaro Andalan Indonesia ($AADI), anak usaha ADRO di bisnis batu bara termal yang akan di-_spin-off_ dalam waktu dekat. Harga penawaran PUPS AADI berkisar 2,4-2,6 miliar dolar AS, bergantung pada rata-rata harga tertimbang (VWAP) pada hari pertama emiten tersebut melantai di bursa. Dengan asumsi kurs sebesar 15.811 rupiah per dolar AS, rentang harga tersebut setara dengan setara ~5.550-5.950 rupiah per saham. Investor yang telah mendapat hak PUPS AADI dan hendak menebusnya dapat melakukan _exercise_ pada 6-10 Desember 2024. AADI sendiri akan melantai di BEI pada 5 Desember 2024, dengan jadwal penawaran umum IPO pada 29 November-3 Desember 2024. Adapun harga penawaran umum perdana saham AADI [ditetapkan](https://www.ksei.co.id/Announcement/Files/173985_ksei_6334_dir_1124_202411281214.pdf) sebesar 5.550 rupiah per saham.

Secara kumulatif selama 10M24, penjualan Komatsu mencapai 3.764 unit (	-19,8% YoY), setara 86,5% dari target 2024 di level 4.350 unit. dengan _market share_ sebesar 27% (vs. 9M24: 27%, 10M23: 30%). Dari segmen kontraktor pertambangan, UNTR mencatatkan volume produksi batu bara sebesar 125 juta ton (+14,7% YoY) selama 10M24, dengan _overburden removal_ sebesar 1 miliar bcm (+6,8% YoY).

tickerNews.title: POWR Announces Interim Dividend for 2024 Book Year
tickerNews.content: $POWR: Cikarang Listrindo akan [membagikan](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202411/5708f5a554_d7619999fa.pdf) dividen interim tahun buku 2024 senilai ~28,1 juta dolar AS atau 28,2 rupiah per saham. _Cum date_ di pasar reguler dan negosiasi pada 6 Desember 2024, dengan pembayaran pada 18 Desember 2024. tickerNews.title: CITA Takes Part in New Shares Issued by ADMR Subsidiary, Maintaining Ownership Stake
tickerNews.content: $CITA: Cita Mineral Investindo [mengumumkan](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202411//89fd283554_1db21d8adc.pdf) telah mengambil bagian atas 176.556 (12,5%) saham baru yang diterbitkan entitas usaha Adaro Minerals Indonesia ($ADMR), PT Kalimantan Aluminium Industry, senilai 176,6 miliar rupiah. Ltd. sebesar 22,5%, dan CITA sebesar 12,5%.

tickerNews.title: Alexander Ramlie Increases Shareholdings in AMMN
tickerNews.content: $AMMN: Direktur Utama Amman Mineral Internasional, Alexander Ramlie, membeli ~1,4 juta saham AMMN dengan harga rata-rata 9.638 rupiah per lembar pada 21-22 November 2024. Total nilai transaksi mencapai ~13,6 miliar rupiah. Setelah [transaksi ini](https://www.idx.co.id/StaticData/NewsAndAnnouncement/ANNOUNCEMENTSTOCK/From_EREP/202411/83bfd8dbfc_61f7315217.pdf), kepemilikan Alexander Ramlie di AMMN naik dari 0,534% menjadi 0,536%.

tickerNews.title: BIRD Expects EVs to Become Cheaper Due to Local BYD Plant, Aims for 20% EV Fleet by 2030
tickerNews.content: $BIRD: Komisaris Utama Bluebird Group Holding, Noni Purnomo, [mengatakan](https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2024-11-27/indonesia-s-biggest-taxi-firm-bets-byd-plant-to-cut-ev-prices) kepada _Bloomberg_ bahwa kehadiran pabrik BYD di Indonesia dapat menurunkan harga mobil listrik. Noni menyebutkan bahwa harga mobil listrik bagi Blue Bird sekitar 3,5x lipat lebih tinggi dibandingkan harga mobil konvensional. Penurunan harga mobil listrik dapat membantu BIRD dalam mentransformasi armadanya, di mana perseroan menargetkan kontribusi kendaraan listrik mencapai 3% dari total armada pada 2025 dan 20% dari total armada pada 2030. Per akhir 2023, total armada BIRD mencapai 23.000 kendaraan, dengan 1% di antaranya dikontribusikan oleh kendaraan listrik. Pabrik BYD di Indonesia sendiri akan mulai beroperasi pada awal 2026.

tickerNews.title: WSKT Targets New Contracts of IDR 14.5 Trillion in 2024, Secured IDR 6.8 Trillion So Far
tickerNews.content: $WSKT: _[Antara](https://www.antaranews.com/berita/4492845/waskita-karya-optimistis-capai-target-kontrak-baru-rp145-triliun)_ melaporkan bahwa Waskita Karya menargetkan perolehan nilai kontrak baru sebesar 14,5 triliun rupiah selama 2024, lebih rendah -14,2% dibandingkan realisasi 2023 di level 16,9 triliun rupiah. WSKT sendiri telah mencatatkan nilai kontrak baru sebesar 6,8 triliun rupiah (	-48,1% YoY) selama 10M24, setara 46,9% dari target 2024. Direktur Waskita Karya, Rudi Purnomo, mengatakan bahwa pihaknya akan mengumumkan tambahan kontrak baru sebesar 5,8 triliun rupiah hingga akhir 2024. Selain itu, Rudi menyebutkan bahwa WSKT saat ini sedang mengikuti tender proyek jalan tol _elevated_ dari swasta senilai 3 triliun rupiah, serta tengah menjajaki beberapa proyek pembangunan gedung.

tickerNews.title: MIND ID Designing Equity Story for Inalum IPO, Budgeting IDR 267.8T in Capex for 2025-2029
tickerNews.content: Direktur Portofolio dan Pengembangan Usaha MIND ID, Dilo Seno Widagdo, [mengatakan](https://investasi.kontan.co.id/news/mind-id-ungkap-kelanjutan-ipo-inalum-dan-kemungkinan-ipo-freeport) bahwa saat ini pihaknya tengah merancang _equity story_ untuk PT Indonesia Asahan Aluminium (Inalum) agar lebih menarik ketika ditawarkan kepada investor di pasar saham. tickerNews.title: SILO Shareholders Approve Yasonna H Laoly as President Commissioner and New Directors
